ygData.subject: Re: Sheet Metal
ygData.msgSnippet: Aye you are right brother smith we can make sheets, I was confused on making the bricks of ore to make the sheets, am I correct in this assumption that we
ygData.messageBody:
Aye you are right brother smith we can make sheets, I was confused on making
the bricks of ore to make the sheets, am I correct in this assumption that
we cannot make the sheets ?
Oh and where does one get the blue ore?
WARNING LONG POST :)
Now I would like to say my 2 cents on our prices.
First if we all agree to stick to a set price then we will get what we ask
for, cornering the market so to speak. Im not saying make the prices so
outrages that they cannot afford to buy from us, but at least make it a
profitable trade once again. Yes, there will be the rouge who comes thru
once a month and sells for a lesser price, but, thats once a month. I feel
that for all of our well being we need to band ( no pun intended ) together
to make this work. If you want to sell, or even give away the occasional
piece for cost or slightly above cost at least keep it under the table. I do
this once in awhile to build a good reputation with my clients. It works
believe me. Sell Bob a set of bracers for 8pp because he's down on his luck
or whatever reason you choose, but tell Bob to keep it to himself, but tell
him what you would like in return is for him to advertise for you, and in
return you will give him better pricing, this works!!! I was in gfay and did
this, sent out my auction, next thing I knew "Bob" was shouting about what a
great smith and guy I was on my prices etc etc, I made 5 complete suits of
banded within about 90 mins, made 600pp, and in return I gave "Bob" his
tunic at cost.
Maybe Im wrong here to some of you and I dont need your flames etc. All I
am saying is that,the prices I sell for are about what we are talking about,
it just takes word of mouth to get the forge a hoppin and WE are making a
profit again.
Eoroth Mishakal
Cazic Thule Server
Smith of the 145th lvl
----- Original Message -----
From: Bryan G Hardy <bhardy@...>
To: <EQ_Blacksmiths@onelist.com>
Sent: Sunday, July 11, 1999 5:55 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Blacksmiths] Sheet Metal


> From: "Bryan G Hardy" <bhardy@...>
>
> Aye, we can make sheets... same way as detailed in the book. We cannot,
> however, make folded sheets... Now, I've heard rumors galore, but the
> one that seems to keep turning up the most is that we will not be able to
> forge folded sheets until the expansion comes out, which seriously pisses
me
> off.
>
> BTW, Banded will only take you to 175 skill.
>
> Also, has anyone played with the Blue Ore yet? I tried a couple
> combinations,
> one brick one flask, and then two bricks one flask, no combine on both
> attempts. If anyone has had any success, please let me know. Otherwise
> I assume that this end product has been "administratively broken" just as
> the folded sheets are.
>
> Lord Joror Ironfrost
> High Shaman of Halas
> Master Blacksmith - 175 skill
> Mithaniel Marr
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: mbutler <mbutler@...>

> Sent: Sunday, July 11, 1999 5:31 PM
